General.Name: Telecomunicações Brasileiras S.A. - TELEBRÁS
General.Description: Telecomunicações Brasileiras S.A. - Telebras provides multimedia communication services. It offers broadband internet connection services for universities, research centers, schools, hospitals, service centers, telecommunity centers, and other points of public interest; and infrastructure and support networks for telecommunication services provided by private companies, the States, the Federal District, the Municipalities, and non-profit entities. Telecomunicações Brasileiras S.A. - Telebras was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Brasilia, Brazil.
General.Address: Edifício Capital Financial Center, Brasília, DF, Brazil, 70610-440
